pr_title: RHPAM-2674 :Exception thrown when a test scenerio containing a tag is renamed without saving

timeline.bodyText: What if this method throws an exception? Is that catch inside it? Shouldn't we try to prevent errors in there and include it in IncrementalBuildResults?
timeline.author: adrielparedes

replies.bodyText: @adrielparedes Ideally we should try to handle the exception and include the errors in IncrementalBuildResults. but in this particular case, I intend to filter out the faulty modify resource event which results in  NoSuchFileException, IMO This should not be included as part of IncrementalBuildResults. (since user expects to have one build after a SaveAndRename operation, this gives two). All other exceptions  will be handled by the caller method.
replies.author: RishiRajAnand
